query:
ALTER TABLE users 
ADD COLUMN subscriptionTier enum('free','mercury','mars') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'free',
ADD COLUMN subscriptionExpiresAt timestamp NULL,
ADD COLUMN blockedUsers json NULL,
ADD COLUMN blockedTags json NULL,
ADD UNIQUE INDEX users_openId_unique (openId);

ADD COLUMN subscriptionExpiresAt timestamp NULL,

ADD COLUMN blockedTags json NULL,
ADD UNIQUE INDEX users_openId_unique (openId);
